name: The General of Heavens (PROTOTYPE)
description:
"There is no instance of a nation benefitting from prolonged warfare." - Sun Tzu

"If you wish for peace, then prepare for war." - Oda Nobunaga

"A true warrior fights not because he hates what is in front of him, but because he loves what is behind him." - G.K. Chesterton

Change your fate, make your name known throughout all the lands as the greatest General of the Heavens!
